Recap: Allison holds Natalie and Roxy at gunpoint so that they do not tell John that she has escaped. She has baby Sierra with her although they cannot figure out what she'd want with her now that they know she is not related to Mitch. Starr is able to put two and two together and figure out that Langston's big secret is that she's sleeping with Ford. And Markko is ready to do the same. Schuyler and Tea do not know what to do after Allison has taken baby Sierra or what to tell Rex and Gigi.
